page.title: 16Birds 2-Coleshill.
page.content: Many of the recent theats to birds, especially those at the summits of foodchains,were of no significance or non-existent in 1086,e.g A-Use of toxic chemicals in farming B-Over-use of non-toxic chemicals in farming C-Wholesale destruction of habitat D-Shooting with powerful guns E-Atmospheric and aquatic pollution from manufacturing industry F-Atmospheric pollution and direct hits by motor vehicles G-Noise from transport and industry H-Widespread illegal slaughter of birds of prey,by gamekeepers and others who have an interest in the production of large numbers of game birds especially Pheasants for shoots. Grey Herrons are similarly persecuted, by fishing interests.B.L.Kington, Warden&Editor,Ladywalk Nature Reserve.
